entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
